product_summary: Relume is an AI-powered website builder that enables users to create websites quickly and easily. The platform uses artificial intelligence to generate sitemaps, wireframes, and design systems, streamlining the web development process. With Relume, users can build websites in under five minutes and access a library of over 1,000 Webflow components, making it ideal for individuals and teams building simple to advanced websites.
product_pros: Easy to use, AI-powered website builder
Generates sitemaps, wireframes, and design systems
Access to a library of over 1,000 Webflow components
product_cons: May not be suitable for complex website designs
Limited customization options compared to traditional website builders
AI-generated designs may require manual adjustments
May not be suitable for users without basic web design knowledge

product_usecases.details: Relume is ideal for individuals or small businesses looking to create simple websites quickly and easily. The AI-powered design tools make it easy to get started, even for those with no prior web design experience.
Relume can be used to quickly create prototypes of website ideas. The AI-generated designs can be used as a starting point for further development in Webflow or other website builders.
Relume's AI-powered content generation can be used to create website copy, including headlines, body text, and product descriptions. This can save time and effort, especially for large websites.
Relume offers collaboration tools that allow teams to work together on website projects. Team members can share designs, leave comments, and track changes.
Web designers and developers can use Relume to create websites for their clients. The platform's AI-powered tools can help to speed up the development process and deliver high-quality results.

product_toolfor.details: Relume is a great option for individuals who want to create websites quickly and easily, without the need for coding or design skills.
Relume is an affordable and easy-to-use solution for small businesses that need to create a website for their business.
Relume can help web designers to speed up their workflow and deliver high-quality results to their clients.
Relume can help web developers to generate code and create prototypes, saving time and effort.
Relume is a great tool for students learning web design. The AI-powered tools can help them to understand the basics of web design and create their own websites.

free.description: Free plan includes access to 30 Webflow components, 1 project, and unlimited AI usage.

starter.description: Starter plan costs $38/month and includes access to 1,000+ Webflow components, 3 projects, and unlimited AI usage.

pro.description: Pro plan costs $48/month and includes access to 1,000+ Webflow components, unlimited projects, and unlimited AI usage.
